content:
IDynamicProperty Interface

Definition

Indicates that the implementing property should be registered at runtime through the stem.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context.RegisterDynamicProperty* method.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public interface IDynamicProperty
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

Dynamic properties must also expose the IContributeDynamicSink interface if they want to provide dynamic sinks.

Properties

Name

Gets the name of the dynamic property.

public string Name { get; }
Value
String

The name of the dynamic property.

Attributes
get: System.Security.SecurityCritical
